thread.title_full: Young faculty at CityU thrive in early career scheme awards (City University of Hong Kong) ... - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Young faculty at CityU thrive in early career scheme awards (City University of Hong Kong) ...
text: ( Source : City University of Hong Kong ) Young faculty have positioned City University of Hong Kong (CityU) at the top of the Early Career Scheme ( ECS ) for the fourth consecutive year in terms of both the number and funding amount.
